amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of national anti-drug media campaign funding to pay any amounts pursuant to a specific contract.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 23 printed in the Congressional Record to provide that none of the funds made available in the bill under the heading "Special Forfeiture Fund" to support a national media campaign shall be used to pay any amount pursuant to a specific contract.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barr amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
